programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Hanap Ng Puso: A Global Pinoy's Story Marathon
programme.desc: Hanap ng Puso: A Global Pinoy's Story is a monthly program about Pinoy migration.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik Ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: Makuha Ka Sa Tingin
programme.desc: Elcid (Robin Padilla) and his buddy, Tembong (Dennis Padilla), decided to got to Manila to search for greener pastures in Manila.

programme.title: Babangon Ako't Dudurugin Kita
programme.desc: Via and Alfred were kindred souls. They would do anything to get what they wanted no matter what the cost. He wanted a future in politics. She came from a political family who wanted to continue wielding power. They were made for each other.

programme.title: Narito Ang Puso Ko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Matinik Na Bading, Mga Syokeng Buking
programme.desc: Apolinario and his uncle Boyong came from a family of barbers. They earned very little and in order to make more, they pretended to be gay.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Iyong Kandungan
programme.desc: Ramona (Vivian Velez) is ecstatic when she marries Rommel (Ronaldo Valdez). But Ramona remains a virgin wife as Rommel turns out to be a closet homosexual with a boyfriend, Alex (Mark Gil).

programme.title: Lagablab Sa Paraiso
programme.desc: A nurse and her cousin, a nightclub dancer, a honeymooning couple and two male prisoners. Survivors of a shipwreck, they are trapped together in an island. Of different backgrounds and personalities, can they set aside their differences to survive roughing it up in this island?

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Puga
programme.desc: Willy (Rudy Fernandez) tags along with Mogan (Paquito Diaz) and Waldo (Ruel Vernal) when they escaped from prison. Outside, the three continue with their criminal activities to support themselves. Soon, Willy falls in love with Mogan's niece, Leonor (Cherie Gil). Can Willy turn the tables on Mogan and Waldo and bring them to justice instead?

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Mukhang Bungo
programme.desc: Boboy (Redford White) is a stuntman living with his mother and father. After his father is killed, he takes a job as a security guard and becomes a vigilante. With the help of his fellow policemen, he tries to track down the syndicate.

programme.title: Boy Recto
programme.desc: When a busy street - Claro M. Recto becomes living hell for students and young people, Boy Recto (Ronnie Ricketts) undertake a dangerous rescue mission to save the youngstersfrom attack by various gangsters.

programme.title: Kahit Ako'y Busabos
programme.desc: Guiller (Ace Vergel), a young man who grew up in the slums of Tondo as a street toughie. In truth though, he was a kind-hearted man, who was forced to hide the good in him in order to survive in the cruel environment he grew up in.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator
programme.desc: After living a life full of vices, women and violence, Boyong Mañalac decided to turn his life around and mend his ways by taking after his father, an upright police officer. Boyong Mañalac personify the ideals of integrity and service to his countrymen.

programme.title: Proboys
programme.desc: This is the story of five young women, their adventures and misadventures in their search for Mr. Right.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan, Hanggang Kailan
programme.desc: On the death of their father, the heiress, Dina sent her illegitimate sisters Alice and Vina out of her vast hacienda and even deprived them of what was rightfully theirs. A few years later, the hardworking and determined Alice returned, ready to turn the tables on her wicked sister.

programme.title: Juan Tamad Jr.
programme.desc: Child wonder Niño Muhlach plays the precocious Juan whose lovable antics as a lazy boy translates into a rip-roaring comedy feature film. But Juan's carefree lifestyle halts when he is kidnapped by a child labor gang. What will happen if Juan is able to use his laziness to be able to escape?

programme.title: Totoy Mola
programme.desc: He was already different even before he was born. As he grew up, he became the object of people's curiosity. Until he met the woman who would change his life forever.

programme.title: Maruja
programme.desc: The classic love story by Mars Ravelo came to life again on the motion picture screen. Maruja, the daughter of a rich landowner and Gabriel, the illegitimate son of a Spanish friar, first fell in love a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Ang Mamatay Nang Dahil Sa Iyo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo characterizes a patriotic soldier whose amor patria runs curdling in his veins. His ideologies led him to a clash of opinions with his younger brother.

programme.title: Misis Mo, Misis Ko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Two married couples, Dina and Edu and Jackie and Ricky, became close friends. The amorous merry-go-round came full circle when hurt at what she and he thought was betrayal.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Sgt. Victor Magno: Kumakasa, Kahit Nag-iisa
